abstracts.cdata!:
This is the Implementation Completion
            Report (ICR) for the Rural Electrification (RE I) Project in
            Indonesia. The overall objective of the RE I project was to
            support the development and implementation of an efficient
            rural electrification program in Indonesia. Overall, the
            Bank's performance has been highly satisfactory.
            Borrower Performance was satisfactory. The key lessons
            learned were as follows: (a) effective strategy for
            increasing the efficiency of RE I delivery and its
            developmental impact is to incorporate in programs that will
            directly help increase local participation; and (b) to
            facilitate that State Electricity Corporation achieves rural
            electrification delivery in an efficient and least cost
            manner, it is necessary to establish transparency and
            financial accountability for the rural electrification program.
